name: Wasteland Dragon Wyrmling
senses: blindsight 10 ft., darkvision 60 ft., passive Perception 12

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 14 (2d10 + 3) piercing damage.

actions.name: Warped Energy Breath (Recharge 6)
actions.desc: The dragon blasts warped arcane energy in a 20-foot line that is 5 feet wide. Each creature in that line must make a DC 11 Dexterity saving throw, taking 22 (5d8) force damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
